verses.verse: A Song <S%H7892><s%> of degrees <S%H4609><s%> for Solomon <S%H8010><s%>. Except the LORD <S%H3068><s%> build <S%H1129><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%>, they labour <S%H5998><s%> in vain <S%H7723><s%> that build <S%H1129><s%> it: except the LORD <S%H3068><s%> keep <S%H8104><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%>, the watchman <S%H8104><s%> waketh <S%H8245><s%> but in vain <S%H7723><s%>. for: or, of Solomon that: Heb. that are builders of it in it

It is vain <S%H7723><s%> for you to rise up <S%H6965><s%> early <S%H7925><s%>, to sit up <S%H3427><s%> late <S%H309><s%>, to eat <S%H398><s%> the bread <S%H3899><s%> of sorrows <S%H6089><s%>: for so he giveth <S%H5414><s%> his beloved <S%H3039><s%> sleep <S%H8142><s%>.
Lo, children <S%H1121><s%> are an heritage <S%H5159><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>: and the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of the womb <S%H990><s%> is his reward <S%H7939><s%>.
As arrows <S%H2671><s%> are in the hand <S%H3027><s%> of a mighty man <S%H1368><s%>; so are children <S%H1121><s%> of the youth <S%H5271><s%>.

Happy <S%H835><s%> is the man <S%H1397><s%> that hath his quiver <S%H827><s%> full <S%H4390><s%> of them: they shall not be ashamed <S%H954><s%>, but they shall speak <S%H1696><s%> with the enemies <S%H341><s%> in the gate <S%H8179><s%>. his: Heb. filled his quiver with them speak: or, subdue, or, destroy
